General.Name: K Laser Technology Inc
General.Description: K Laser Technology Inc., together with its subsidiaries, researches, develops, produces, and sells laser holographic packaging materials, and products and optical instruments. It offers lamination and transfer films, hot stamping and cold foils, laminated papers, and eco-paperboards, as well as security solution products which are used in packaging, label, decoration, fashion, security, decoration, and other applications. The company also provides gastrointestinal endoscopy, and fluorescent pigments and dyes, as well as optical film processing services. It operates through 11 manufacturing sites and 13 sales offices worldwide. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 1 Li Hsin, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 300
